```{r}
library(rvest)
library(tidyverse)
library(RSelenium)
```


```{r}
url <- read_html("http://ctemspublic.pcctg.net/")

url %>%
 html_nodes(".ng-binding") %>%
 html_text()

```

```{r}
url %>%
 html_nodes(".electionlabel") %>%
 html_text()
```


```{r}
url %>%
 html_nodes(".listofNomiees a") %>%
 html_text()
```

```{r}
url %>%
 html_nodes("strong , #current , #current_sub") %>%
 html_text()
```


```{r}
url %>%
 html_nodes(".bgblue") %>%
 html_text()
```
